```{r}
n = 1000
X = cbind(rnorm(n), rnorm(n), rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n))
colnames(X) = 1:ncol(X)

Y = rowSums(X)^2 
data =cbind(Y,X)
colnames(data) = c("y", colnames(X))
```


```{r}

t = proc.time()
form = formula_hal("y ~  h(1,2)", smoothness_orders = 1, data, bins = c(100,5), screen_cor_pval = 0.1)
form

proc.time() - t

```
